resources.string: It seems you have no network connection.
There was an exception which should not happen!
Google Play services is not installed on this device.
Demonstrates how to style a map.
Please click on the link sent over the mail to you to validate your Account.
Please enter your registered Email Id for password reset instructions
Password length should be in between 4 to 8 characters.
Internet is either very slow or disconnected
